title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu on a field in TH, nothing happens. No Javadoc is added to the field.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option should add Javadoc to the selected field in TH.
SR:
1. Open TH (or any other valid location where a field can be added).
2. Right-click on a field.
3. From the context menu, select 'Add Javadoc'.
4. Verify that Javadoc is added to the selected field.
